S

scanCountMax - Variable in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
The property defines the maximum count of scans.
securityValue(double, HashMap<String, Double>) - Static method in class project.context.localization.common.helper.CalculationHelper
The security value is the sum of deviations between the distance of one specific place and all the other ones in the placeDistanceMap.
setActivity(Activity) - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.CommonClass
Sets activity.
setMaxProgressOutput(int) - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.CommonClass
Sets max progress output.
setPlaceString(String) - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Sets place id string.
setScanCountMax(int) - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Sets the max scan count.
showCalculationProgressOutput() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.AverageMeasuresClass
Show calculation progress output.
showLocalizationProgressOutput() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.LocalizationClass
Show the progress output for the initial localization process.
showMeasureProgress() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Show measure progress in progress output.
showMeasuresSaveProgress() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Show save progress.
startLocalization() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.LocalizationClass
Triggers the continous localization of the user by scanning the WiFi and BLE Beacons.
stopLocalization() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.LocalizationClass
Stop the continous localization and unregister the scanResultReceiver and hide the progress output.
stopMeasuring() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Stops measuring.
